defitem.label: Funding:
defitem.item: Web version of the finding aid funded in part by a grant from the National Endowment for the Humanities.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Joseph Gwathmey Estate Inventory, 1836. Accession 26315, Personal Papers Collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Lent for copying by Mary Buraley Gwathmey, 17 May 1965.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Joseph Gwathmey (1758-1824), served in the War of 1812 and was a plantation owner in King William County, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Inventory and appraisement of slaves belonging to the estate of Joseph Gwathmey, King William County, Virginia, dated 27 Dec. 1836. Includes final division of the estate.
